MATRIX INTERIORZ

About Matrix Interiorz

We are a Delhi based design start-up! We specialize in extensive turnkey interior fit-outs with the highest standard of workmanship & service where extreme care is taken for design, relationship & time.

We offer services from concept to completion with Cost Efficient Management; including:

  • Design & Contracting Services,
  • Professional Planning & Space Analysis,
  • Renovating & Re-modelling Space
